group_1.textRight: Well, getting back on topic...
Because of this situation, the village can only ever @hold three residents...
A curse like this has existed every generation.

group_1.textLeft: Was it always like this?

group_1.textRight: It appears so.
...Things have been fine for a while since it became @the three of us,
but it's getting close to the time when I wouldn't @be surprised if new people appeared.

group_1.textLeft: So you're saying...

group_1.textRight: At that time, the next one to disappear will most @likely be me.
Given that I'm the most senior resident!

group_1.textLeft: I think, it's better if it stays the three of us.

group_1.textRight: ...Don't say that, that thing's called a "curse" @after all.
At first, I was pretty shocked...
But because of it, that's how I was able to meet @Sunao and Shizuka!

group_1.textLeft: But...when I think of my appearance causing @someone else to disappear...

group_1.textRight: Mmm, when my senpais discussed whose turn @was next,
they weren't really scared, more relieved in fact.

group_1.textLeft: Ryoko, are you not scared? You would disappear...

group_1.textRight: Mmm, it seems we all have some day we'll @disappear.
Probably that way in the other towns too?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...that's right. Though not like how it is in this village,
where you disappear and give someone else your @spot...

group_1.textRight: We all unexpectedly appeared in this world and will likewise disappear...
It really, is unbelievable.
Why is this how the world works...?
Mmm... [chara:305800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305800:cheek_0][chara:305800:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100][chara:305800:lipSynch_1]@Hard to wrap my head around stuff like this.
...Ah, wait a sec? Then I might as well do it myself.
How about I disappear from this village?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehh?

group_1.textRight: I can get a ride on the guests' vehicle!
Three on the bike at once!?

group_1.textLeft: Umm, that'd go over the seating capacity...
And then what, if you leave?

group_1.textRight: Give it some thought. With one less person, won't someone have to replace them?
I won't need to disappear from this world, and this village will see some new faces!

group_1.textLeft: I object. How things are now is good.

group_1.textRight: New encounters are also something to be joyful for, @you know?

group_1.textLeft: I'm fine with them, but I don't want Ryoko to @disappear.

group_1.textRight: Then, Sunao?

group_1.textLeft: I agree... @Although while I do dislike partings,
I can somewhat see where Ryoko is coming from...

group_1.textRight: Mmm, the three of us are all over the board...
...I'm sorry.
We're having such an unsightly quarrel in front @of our guests.

group_1.textLeft: Hm, not really? I just see that ya have a great relationship?
After all, you're not arguing because you hate @each other!

group_1.textRight: Well, that's true.
I personally hope a newcomer will show up soon,
but Shizuka said she doesn't want us to part,
and Sunao gives the impression we can only leave things as they are.

group_1.textLeft: For as long as this village lies under that mysterious, unbroken curse,
it seems everyone finding happiness is unlikely...
Everyone finding happiness...?@[chara:120301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:120301:cheek_0][chara:120301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_101][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]Maybe that means—

group_1.textRight: It's 'bout this guy's time to shine?
This box is...?

group_1.textLeft: It's for delivering smiles to everyone.
The Reindeer Santas' Magical Okamochi Box!

group_1.textRight: ...I see, in exchange for delivering smiles...

group_1.textLeft: Yup, we're collecting the magical energy produced @by smiles as fuel during our travels!

group_1.textRight: Traveling to the End of the World, how amazing...!
...But uh, now what?
Even if those three open the box while thinkin' of @what they want,
their wishes ain't aligned, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, yeeaah.
Though thinking through the result...
If the three of them open the box together,
wouldn't a present that can make everyone happy come out?

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe opening it together would be best. @Shall we try that?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed!

group_1.textRight: It's decided!
